data.name: K-Pop & Rock Band Manager
data.detailed_description: K-Pop and Rock Band Manager is a management game where you are the manager of a new Band and your aim is to make your Band Famous and get 1000 popularity points, make one million dollars, and have several status symbols like a branded fashion item and/or an apartment. A new star is born! ANM Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.
data.about_the_game: K-Pop and Rock Band Manager is a management game where you are the manager of a new Band and your aim is to make your Band Famous and get 1000 popularity points, make one million dollars, and have several status symbols like a branded fashion item and/or an apartment. A new star is born! ANM Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.
data.short_description: A new star is born! Favour Toys B.V. Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Memory, ATI HD5650 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
